## Introduction

This is a sample presentation using the Universitas Airlangga theme.

- Clean, professional design
- Official UNAIR branding
- Easy to customize

## Brand Colors

The theme uses official Universitas Airlangga colors:

- [UNAIR Blue (#14497F)]{.unair-blue} - Primary
- [UNAIR Yellow (#FFCB05)]{.bg-unair-yellow} - Accent
- Red (#E6282B) - Alerts

## Code Examples

R code with syntax highlighting:

```r
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(color = "#14497F") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Car Weight vs MPG")
```

## Equations

The quadratic formula:

$$
x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}
$$

Inline equations work too: $E = mc^2$
